subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Jeff Garcia agreed to a deal with the Oakland Raiders, who said Garcia would immediately join the starter JaMarcus Russell in the team’s off-season program. Garcia, 39, spent the past two seasons with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, starting 24 games and leading them to the playoffs. He was not re-signed.
